newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.00 percent.
newsitem.headline: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.00 percent.

text.p: The Bank of Finland on Friday injected 1.30 billion markka ($266.8 million) of spot liquidity in an auction of one-month paper at an unchanged 3.00 percent tender rate SPFH.
Before the opening, the central bank forecast a spot liquidity surplus of 2.90 billion markka. The required daily balance for banks was 2.86 billion markka.
The Bank of Finland's tender rate, its chief monetary policy tool, was lowered to 3.00 percent from 3.10 percent on October 9.
